intro: Grow your line. Shoot for glory.
description:
This high-energy hyper-casual runner expands the original experience with faster movement, smoother visuals, and a new wave of dynamic obstacles. Players charge through the tracks while growing a trailing line of followers, multiply your numbers through colour-coded gates, and avoid hazards designed to tear your chain apart. The bigger your trail, the more power you carry into the explosive end-of-run finale.
At the finish, your entire squad is loaded into a cannon and fired toward a series of rotating targets. Each successful hit racks up points, with tighter targets offering larger rewards. Every run showers players with coins that can be saved up to unlock an expanding wardrobe of hats, letting you customise your crew with playful flair.
Build the longest trail you can, survive the gauntlet, and blast your team toward ever higher scores in a continuously evolving, endlessly repeatable sprint.
